column8: 2015 at st. charles borromeo catholic church in north bend
column9: ne. visitation 4:30 - 8 pm tuesday with a vigil/rosary at 7 pm also at the church in north bend. burial will be at memorial cemetery in fremont following the mass. further arrangements are pending at moser memorial chapel in north bend.
